value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Alfonse, what is the country
of Jötunheimr like anyway?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Unlike Niðavellir, the jötnar of
Jötunheimr are fairly large folk.$k$pAnd in contrast to Niðavellir's
reverence for innovation, Jötunheimr
has a culture rooted in tradition...$k$pThe jötnar have excelled at combat
since ancient times, but it is said
that they generally dislike fighting.$k$pJötunheimr is a peaceful country,
and it has been ruled by queens
for generations.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh! Sounds like a nice country, then!
In that case, it might be easier to get
the sword back than I thought!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I hope so... In the response to the
missive we sent ahead of us, they
said they are happy to meet, but...$k$pWell, as long as it all ends peacefully.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|We're meeting the eldest princess,
Nótt, at the castle Barnstokkr, right?
That's what they said?$k$p$EFace_Smile|I'm so excited! This is my first time
to Jötunheimr, you know!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アゼル,ch06_28_Azel_M_Normal,Face|Arvis... He was more than a brother
to me. More than a father, even.
But now...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|We've got trouble, Alfonse!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|What's wrong, Commander Anna?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|According to our scouts, a jötun force
is waiting for us in battle formations
just ahead!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What? Battle formations?!$k$p$Sbs150|
